attributes.action: Make It A Law For People To Keep Problem Dogs On A Lead Between A Certain Time Period.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this is for people who own dogs that have a problems with other dogs. i am one of these people. 

today while on a walk with my dog, we saw another dog running towards us which i knew this dog could be aggressive to our dog. at this point our dog was on a lead and had a muzzle on- as he always does. this dog began attacking our dog and my dog was defenceless. i was trying to split it up when i was bit by the other dog and injured my hand, badly. The owners didn't even apologise or ask if i was ok.

by the way, i'm 15 years old and have depression problems. its should be made a law for people like my and them to keep our dogs on a lead between certain times to avoid these types of situations. something needs to be done. i accept my dog can be problematic and so should these people.
